abstract: Spring's chokers, like those in the '90s, have a bit of a bite.
snippet: Spring's chokers, like those in the '90s, have a bit of a bite.
lead_paragraph: A snapshot of spring's best trends and a hint at what you'll want to wear next year.The last time we saw chokers with staying power was in the '90s. And like those of the last millennium, spring's have a bit of a bite - dog collar sorts at Jean Paul Gaultier, gold bondagelike ones at Lanvin and gothic juju pendant styles at Emilio Pucci and Delfina Delettrez all hug the neck with gripping poise.
